library.description: sql.js is a port of SQLite to JavaScript, by compiling the SQLite C code with Emscripten.
library.name: sql.js

library.description: light json data storage that allows indexing of data for faster retrieval and saving to localstorage
library.name: JSDB

library.description: TaffyDB wraps localStorage and provides comprehensive query related functionality.
library.name: TaffyDB

library.description: PouchDB is a JavaScript library that allows you to store and query data for web applications that need to work offline, and sync with an online database when you are online.
library.name: PouchDB

library.description:
( à la SQL ) [ælæ ɛskju:ɛl] - AlaSQL is an open source SQL database for Javascript with a strong foucus on query speed and datasource flexibillity for relational data, schemaless data, and graph data. It works in your browser, Node.js, IO.js and Cordova.

The library is designed for:

Fast SQL based in-memory data processing for BI and ERP applications on fat clients
Easy ETL and option for persistency by data import / manipulation / export for several formats
All major browsers, Node.js, and mobile applications
library.name: AlaSQL
